name: Chocolate Malted Milkshake
recipeIngredient: 1/2 Cup original flavor malted milk powder
Halved malted milk balls, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: In the container of a blender, combine the ice cream and malted milk powder. Add the milk, a quarter cup at a time, blending between each addition, until the desired consistency is reached. Garnish with whipped cream and malted milk balls.
